name: Adore
summary: Adore is a monster taming action roguelite where the main character, Lukha, is able to summon and control creatures to fight by his side in a simple and innovative way.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Monster taming roguelite
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020年2月18日 (Early Access)
  • 开发: Cadabra Games
  • 发行: Cadabra Games
